translation.en: He was eating a meal in the evening.
The child got cheered up.
The child figured it out.
The child was concerned about the hazards.
The child hid something so their friend wouldn't find it.
He cheered up after their talk.
An alternative was now accessible.
What they saw was unanticipated.
An invitation was extended to come inside and rest.
translation.tam: Chatha and Terubim, the fire warm.

translation.en: With their old plans in ruin, it was time to try their next idea.
They proceeded without seeking advice.
The evidence was corroborated.
The ambassador worked hard to broker a deal between everyone involved.
They rushed him.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: Knowing they would both be needed, they went together.
They ignored the advice they were given.
The temptation caused him to move closer.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: Everything known was indisputable.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: The beast was their enemy.
It made them happy.
She strongly appealed for something.
The manufacturing line was interrupted.
They had had an arduous voyage.
They couldn't think where to begin hunting for it.
The pipe burst, causing a flood.
The child aided her friend.
She didn't know, but should have.
The council asked for her report.
Hi.
She knew nothing she could do would make it better.
Things were improving.
They made the book available for anyone who wanted it.
She said no to his offer of food.
No matter how hard they tried, he just couldn't seem to get the picture.
The child covertly monitored what was said.
He is fully booked.
They had a plan of action.
She struggled to understand what to do.
Something the child obscured was discovered.
The child needed to nap.
They drove the truck across the country.
He is tired.
The truck broke down.
The ambassador asked whether they needed food.
His arm had been broken.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: She would keep going until it worked, no matter what.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: Things had not improved.
The hood was taken off, and the person was now visible.
The child was ready to hear the story.
translation.tam: Kira at court, the court filled.

translation.en: Though their relationship was strained, they still had to do the task.
